subject: Fishing, Sport
Salmon
Fish Farming
lead_paragraph: Delphi Lodge, which got into the hatchery business in 1990, releases 50,000 smolts each year, of which perhaps 1,500 return as adults.
snippet: Delphi Lodge, which got into the hatchery business in 1990, releases 50,000 smolts each year, of which perhaps 1,500 return as adults.
